snippet.title: In Sound Mind – Story Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Discover where the monsters truly reside. Play the In Sound Mind demo now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1119980/In_Sound_Mind/  

In Sound Mind is an upcoming psychological horror game for PS5, Xbox Series X and PC. Play as Desmond, a psychologist in the small town of Milton Haven who is dealing with some seemingly eerie events in his town. Listening to tapes of his sessions with some of his patients may help him discover hidden clues to what is going on... or take him somewhere darker. Learn more: http://modusgames.com/in-sound-mind/ 

Play the demo now: http://store.steampowered.com/app/1119980/In_Sound_Mind/  
Follow Us on Twitter: http://modus.games/twitter  
Like Us on Facebook: http://modus.games/facebook  
Join our Discord: https://modus.games/discord
